The '''Six Paths Yang Power''' is a power wielded by [[Hagoromo Ōtsutsuki]] and later given to [[Naruto Uzumaki]]. It is represented by a light-coloured, sun-like {{translation|palm seal|掌の印|shō no in}}<ref>''[[Naruto: Shinobi Collection Shippū Ranbu]]''</ref> on the user's right hand.

== Background ==
Besides being comprised of the [[Yang Release]] [[nature transformation]] and having the ability to give life to or heal things, the actual applications of this power aren't clearly understood. It is possible that it augments the user's other abilities.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 674, page 16</ref>

As noted by [[Black Zetsu]], there is a special resonance between the Six Paths Yin and Yang powers, allowing the wielders to [[Sensing Technique|sense]] each other's presence.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 684, page 13</ref> When the [[Yin]] and Yang powers are used together, they can [[Fūinjutsu|seal]] and transform their target into the core of the [[Six Paths — Chibaku Tensei]] technique. When Naruto did so in conjunction with [[Sasuke Uchiha]]'s [[Six Paths Yin Power]], the palm seal on his right hand vanished, returning to Hagoromo's own right hand.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 690, pages 1-5</ref>

== Trivia ==
* When [[Six Paths Sage Mode]] debuted in the ''[[Boruto: Naruto Next Generations]]'' manga, Naruto's right palm seamlessly had the Six Paths Yang Power mark. This was removed in the tankōbon version.<ref>''Boruto'' chapter 5</ref>
